Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Ohio
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand & Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute near 59th/State
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses temp. rrtd WB: 59th, Michigan, 55th, Wells, 59th; EB: 55th, Wells, 59th, Wentworth, 55th, State, 59th; due to street blockage at 59th/State

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 59th/State due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 59th, Michigan, 55th, Wells, and then resume their normal route on 59th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 55th, Wells, 59th, Wentworth, 55th, State and 59th.

Allow extra travel time.
